name: 2021 The 7th International Conference on Teaching and Education Sciences
content: Publication： For exccellent papers accepted by ICTES 2021 will be recommended to be published into： International Journal of Learning and Teaching (IJLT: http://www.ijlt.org/)，Abstracting/Indexing: Google Scholar; Crossref, etc. International Journal of Information and Education Technology (IJIET: http://www.ijiet.org)，Abstracting/ Indexing: Scopus (Since 2019), INSPEC (IET), EBSCO, Electronic Journals Library, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc. Regular Papers: 8 pages, including all figures, tables, and references.
